blog.name: ehxkor
blog.title: ოɛтʜɑოpʜɛтɑოɛოɛṡ
blog.description:
• || Art Tag || Void 9 Official || •

• || My Archive || •

Hit follow to join my army of harvested kidneys!

Welcome to neon hard dance hell, I am your tour guide! I’m a cynical nightcrawler from Calgary Alberta who really likes raves, tech, drugs, and aliens. I drink lots of energy drinks and coffee and sometimes stay up for multiple days at a time. I travel sometimes. Visual designer for @404-E and occasional artist for Future State Music

Commissions: Ask Me :)
